metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6418 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 80.0.3987.122 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
